attributes.action: Abolish School terms and allow children 4 weeks holiday plus Bank Holidays
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I would like to see schools run for 52 weeks of the year. Then working parents can take holidays when they would like, without the need to arrange child care during enforced holidays. There would be restrictions for certain age groups when important examinations are due.
This would improve work access for single parents, reduce holiday costs at certain times of the year, and be more flexible.
